title: Ennio Morricone - Menage all'Italiana OST
description:
Morricone's always amazing soundtrack composition skills extend to Franco Indovina's 1966 classic Italian comedy "Menage Italian Style" starring Ugo Tognazzi as the man who decides to fake his own death in an attempt to get away from his harem of lovers collected during his days as a traveling salesman. Featuring songs performed by Anna Moffo and Dino, two famous Italian pop stars of the period.

1. In Fondo Ai Miei Occhi
2. Ho Messo Gli Occhi Su du Te
3. 1+1+1=4
4. La Moglie Assassina
5. Menage All'italiana
6. Fermateli!
7. Ho Messo Gli Occhi Su di Te
8. In Fondo Ai Miei Occhi
